誃字的基本解释

誃
yí
台名；门名。

誃
chǐ
离开；脱离。

誃
chì
大度。

誃字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yí］［chí］
［《廣韻》弋支切，平支，以。］
［《集韻》陳知切，平支，澄。］
亦作“誃1”。
(1)离别；脱离。
(2)同“簃”。于省吾有《双剑誃诸子新证》。
(3)见“謻門”。

誃字的康熙字典解释

【酉集上】【言字部】　誃； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页1160第09
【唐韻】尺氏切。【集韻】【韻會】敞尒切，?音侈。【說文】離別也。　又人名。【宋史·宗室表】修武郞士誃。　又通作哆。【爾雅·釋言】期、誃，離也。【註】?齊曰斯。誃見《詩疏》。斯、析、誃、張，皆分離也。?齊曰斯者，《?風·墓門》斧以斯之是也。云誃，見詩者《小雅·巷伯》：哆兮侈兮。鄭箋：因箕星之哆，而又侈大之是也。誃、哆音義同。　又【集韻】或作謻。【說文】周景王作洛陽誃臺。【徐曰】《爾雅》堂樓邊小屋。此蓋小屋連於大屋體，其實則別自爲一區處也。【前漢·諸侯王表】周有逃責之臺。【服䖍註】周赧王負責，乃逃此臺，後人因以名之。【劉德註】洛陽南宮謻臺是也。【師古曰】謻音移。　又【集韻】【類篇】?余知切，音移。與謻同。臺名。一曰門名。互詳謻字註。　又或作䛂。【戰國策】出誃門也。【註】誃，別也。元作䛂。　又【玉篇】直移切【廣韻】直離切【集韻】?知切，?音馳。亦同謻。離也，別也。　又【集韻】【類篇】?待可切，跎上聲。欺罔也。與詑、訑?同。　又【集韻】唐佐切，跎去聲。

誃字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
誃字的起名意思

暂无。

yí
Station name; door name.

chǐ

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yí］［chí］
["Guangyun" Yi branch cut, flat branch, to. ]
["Ji Yun" Chen Zhiqie, flat branch, clear. ]
Also known as "誃1".
(1) Parting; leaving.
(2) Same as "簃". Yu Xingwu has "New Proof of Two Swords".
(3) See "謻门".

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[You Ji 1] [Words Department] 　誃; Kangxi Strokes: 13; Page Number: Page 1160 Page 09
[Tang Yun] Chi's cut. [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] Open and cut, and the sound is extravagant. [Said Wen] Parting also.　Another name. [Song History · Clan Table] Xiuwu Tanshi.　Tong Zuo Duo again. 【Erya·Interpretation】Period, transcript, and leave. [Note]? Qi Yuesi. See "Summary of Poems". Sri Lanka, analysis, transcript, and Zhang are all separated. "Qi Yuesi", "The Wind·Tomb Gate" is also the same as Axe Yisi. Yun Tan, see the poet "Xiaoya Xiang Bo": Du Xi is extravagant. Zheng Jian: Because of Jixing's duo, it is also extravagant. Tong and duo have the same meaning.　 [Ji Yun] or Zuo Wan. [Said the text] Zhou Jing Wang made a copy of Luoyang. [Xu Yue] "Er Ya" is a small house beside the hall. This small house is connected to the big house, but in fact, it's not a district by itself. [Former Han·Princes and Kings] Zhou has a platform for evading responsibility. [Servant's Note] King Zhou Zhe was in charge, but escaped from this station, and later generations will be named after him. [Liu De's Note] Luoyang Nangong Futai is also. [Shigu said] The sound shifted.　[Jiyun] [Class Chapter]? Yu Zhiqie, voice shift. Same as 謻. Station name. One is the name of the door. Mutual detailed 謻 word note.　Or as 囂. [Warring States Policy] Out of the door. [Note] You, don't. Yuan Zuozuo.　[Yu Pian] Straight moving cut [Guang Yun] Straight away cut [Ji Yun]? Know cut,? Yinchi. Also the same as 謻. Leave it, don’t.　 [Ji Yun] [Class Chapter]? Waiting to be cut, stomping on sound. Bullying too. Same as Pi and Pi?　[Jiyun] Tang Zuoqie again, stomping away.
